sentences.sentence: And now esteemed effendi we feast.
sentences.translation: 现在，尊敬的先生，我们尽情享受吧。

sentences.sentence: When the king learned this, he got angry and sent his men to catch Effendi at once.
sentences.translation: 当国王得知这时，他生气了，派人去一次赶上分区区会。

sentences.sentence: I heard a voice calling my name, 'Abdullah Effendi.' I looked around but saw no one.
sentences.translation: 这时我听到一个声音在叫我的名字：“荣耀的阿卜杜拉啊！”
